#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int N, M;
int t;
char grid[205][205];
int state[205][205];
int dx[8] = {1, 1, 0, -1, -1, -1, 0, 1};
int dy[8] = {0, -1, -1, -1, 0, 1, 1, 1};
void spread(int i, int j, int label)
{
    if(state[i][j] == 0)
    {
     state[i][j] = label;
    int x, y;
    for(int k=0; k<8; k++)
    {
     x = i+dx[k], y = j+dy[k];
     if(x>=0 && x<N && y>=0 && y<M && grid[x][y] == '#')
     {
         spread(x, y, label);
     }
    }
    }
}
void print()
{
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
        for(int j=0; j<N; j++)
        {
            cout<<state[i][j]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
}
void solve()
{
    scanf("%d%d", &N, &M);
    //cout<<N<<endl;

    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
        for(int j=0; j<N; j++)
            state[i][j] = 0;
    }
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
        scanf("%s", grid[i]);
    }
    int lab = 1;
    for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
    {
        for(int j=0; j<M; j++)
        {
            if(state[i][j] == 0 && grid[i][j] == '#')
            {
                spread(i, j, lab);
                lab++;
            }
        }
    }
    //print();
    lab--;

    printf("%d\n", lab);

}

int main()
{
   #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
   // freopen("output1.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif


    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
